entry.title: $2500 // 1br duplex! Clinton Hill! W/D in unit!
entry.content:
Bright, sunny, south facing duplex 1br in the amazing Clinton Hill neighborhood. Also very close to the action in Fort Greene, Bed-Stuy and Crown Heights.

Laundry in unit, hardwood floors, spiral staircase, lots of space, dishwasher, baseboard heat, a/c window unit, 4th floor walkup.

Franklin C and S trains are on the same block. Classon G train is a 10 minute walk. Grocery store, Co-Op, coffee shops, juice shop, restaurants all nearby. Doris is a great bar right next door. Wellness center/healing cafe is located in the ground floor of building - offering juices, teas, yoga, meditation, pilates, etc.

A few larger buildings have recently opened or are going up nearby, so amenities are flowing into the neighborhood.

Rental company office is down the street and the super is very reliable and fast.

Available Feb 15 or March 1st. I'm moving out early and will be showing the apartment. You could either rent until May 31st or sign a new lease with the management company.
